// Pivot 0, 0
int L_Flipper[18] = {
	7, 15,
	49, 13,
	52, 12,
	52, 9,
	50, 7,
	11, 4,
	6, 5,
	4, 7,
	4, 11
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float L_Flipper[18] = {
	0.122807f, 0.750000f,
	0.859649f, 0.650000f,
	0.912281f, 0.600000f,
	0.912281f, 0.450000f,
	0.877193f, 0.350000f,
	0.192982f, 0.200000f,
	0.105263f, 0.250000f,
	0.070175f, 0.350000f,
	0.070175f, 0.550000f
};
